info.name: RoleMembers
info.description: Allows you to see the members of each role on a server.

changelog.title: Small New Feature!
items: You can now show member counts for each role directly in the context menu, just enable it in the plugin's settings.

changelog.title: Mostly Fixed!
items: User popouts will not show on click, that *may* come in a later update from the library.

defaultConfig.name: Show Member Counts
defaultConfig.note: Enabling this shows the members counts of each role in the context menu
